blademaster:ThunderSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're in [#4A8CFF]Lightning[] [#4A8CFF]Stance[], deal !D! damage again.
blademaster:ThunderSlash.NAME: Thunder Slash

blademaster:AirSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're in [#00FF2A]Wind[] [#00FF2A]Stance[], deal !D! damage again.
blademaster:AirSlash.NAME: Air Slash

blademaster:Cut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL On Stance switch, add this card from the Discard pile to your Hand.
blademaster:Cut.NAME: Cut

blademaster:Gust.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. Enter [#00FF2A]Wind[] [#00FF2A]Stance[]. NL Exhaust.
blademaster:Gust.NAME: Gust

blademaster:ThunderingOpener.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. Enter [#4A8CFF]πLightning Stance[]. NL Exhaust.
blademaster:ThunderingOpener.NAME: Thundering Opener

blademaster:TraverseCut:WIND.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Weak.
blademaster:TraverseCut:WIND.NAME: Traverse Cut

blademaster:TraverseCut:LIGHTNING.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
blademaster:TraverseCut:LIGHTNING.NAME: Traverse Cut

blademaster:Thrust:WIND.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage equal to your Wind Charges.
blademaster:Thrust:WIND.NAME: Thrust

blademaster:Thrust:LIGHTNING.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage equal to your πLightning Charges.
blademaster:Thrust:LIGHTNING.NAME: Thrust

blademaster:Vortex:WIND.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! blademaster:Bleeding to ALL enemies. Apply !blademaster:M2! Weak to ALL enemies.
blademaster:Vortex:WIND.NAME: Vortex

blademaster:Vortex:LIGHTNING.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! blademaster:Bleeding to ALL enemies. Apply !blademaster:M2! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
blademaster:Vortex:LIGHTNING.NAME: Vortex

blademaster:ColdBlood.DESCRIPTION: Finisher. Requires 6 [#860037]Combo[]. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Strength.
blademaster:ColdBlood.NAME: Cold Blood

blademaster:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of the combat.
blademaster:Sharpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade !M! random cards in your hand for the rest of the combat.
blademaster:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen

blademaster:DeadlyDance.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! blademaster:Bleeding to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.
blademaster:DeadlyDance.NAME: Deadly Dance
